en-US.summary: Train yourself to become a skilled ninja master! Complete fun tasks and activites on your journey to leveling up in the ranks of Ninja School!
en-US.name: Ninja School
en-US.description:
This skill will engage your child by providing them with fun and exciting tasks to complete on their path to becoming a Ninja Warrior! Tasks include physical activies and make-believe. As your child accomplishes more they will gain new ranks! 

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
